verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> upon a <S%H3678>throne<s%>, <S%H7311>high<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%>, and his <S%H7757>train<s%> <S%H4392%H853>filled<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

<S%H4605>Above<s%> it <S%H5975>stood<s%> the <S%H8314>seraphims<s%>: each <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%>; with <S%H8147>twain<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and with <S%H8147>twain<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and with <S%H8147>twain<s%> he did <S%H5774>fly<s%>.

And one <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto another, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6918>Holy<s%>, <S%H6918>holy<s%>, <S%H6918>holy<s%>, is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4393>full<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And the <S%H520>posts<s%> of the <S%H5592>door<s%> <S%H5128>moved<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H7121>cried<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H6227>smoke<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me! for I am <S%H1820>undone<s%>; because I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>: for mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Then <S%H5774>flew<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8314>seraphims<s%> unto me, having a live <S%H7531>coal<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, which he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> with the <S%H4457>tongs<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

And he <S%H5060>laid<s%> it upon my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Lo, this hath <S%H5060>touched<s%> thy <S%H8193>lips<s%>; and thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away<s%>, and thy <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H3722>purged<s%>.

Also I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Whom shall I <S%H7971>send<s%>, and who will <S%H3212>go<s%> for us? Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, Here am I; <S%H7971>send<s%> me.

¶ And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and <S%H559>tell<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye <S%H8085>indeed<s%>, but <S%H995>understand<s%> not; and <S%H7200>see<s%> ye <S%H7200>indeed<s%>, but <S%H3045>perceive<s%> not.

Make the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8080>fat<s%>, and make their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, and <S%H8173>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; lest they <S%H7200>see<s%> with their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with their <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H995>understand<s%> with their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and <S%H7725>convert<s%>, and be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, how long? And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, Until the <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H7582>wasted<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H127>land<s%> be <S%H8077>utterly<s%> <S%H7582>desolate<s%>,
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H7368>removed<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> far <S%H7368>away<s%>, and there be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5805>forsaking<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ But yet in it shall be a <S%H6224>tenth<s%>, and it shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and shall be <S%H1197>eaten<s%>: as a teil <S%H424>tree<s%>, and as an <S%H437>oak<s%>, whose <S%H4678>substance<s%> is in them, when they <S%H7995>cast<s%> their leaves: so the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be the <S%H4678>substance<s%> thereof.
